name: Mika Melatika's Funky Adventure
description:
This is a fan game for Mika Melatika, a VTuber of Nijisanji

Development on this game started after Mika Melatika's "Viewers Got Talent" got announced on the 9th of February 2023, fortunately we managed to finish this game on time!

This game is a platformer with a twist, not every playthrough is the same!
Depending on how good you are at platformers, this game could be easy or difficult, every time you get a 'Game Over' you are sent back to the main menu and have to start a new run!

You can wall jump as much as you want, throw projectiles to fend off from bad guys and find cool hats!

Controls:
Move with Arrow keys
Jump with 'z' and shoot stuff with 'x'
Slide with 'shift'
